plot: An ex-convict tries to rehabilitate himself in a hot, humid Mediterranean neighborhood. An encounter with his neighbor's teenage daughter, threatens to undermine the order he is striving for in his life.
title: Toothache
plot_es: An ex-convict tries to rehabilitate himself in a hot, humid Mediterranean neighborhood. An encounter with his neighbor's teenage daughter, threatens to undermine the order he is striving for in his life.
plot_en: An ex-convict tries to rehabilitate himself in a hot, humid Mediterranean neighborhood. An encounter with his neighbor's teenage daughter, threatens to undermine the order he is striving for in his life.
